name: Acro Bike
rules: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Aggron Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Aggron-EX.

name: Archie's Ace in the Hole
rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Put a Water Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. Then, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dive Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Water Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Escape Rope
rules: Each player switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. (Your opponent switches first. If a player does not have a Benched Pokémon, that player doesn't switch Pokémon.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Exp. Share
rules: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card that was attached to that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

name: Fresh Water Set
rules: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Gardevoir Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gardevoir-EX.

name: Groudon Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes Primal Groudon-EX.

name: Kyogre Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes Primal Kyogre-EX.

name: Maxie's Hidden Ball Trick
rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand. Put a Fighting Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. Then, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor Birch's Observations
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck and flip a coin. If heads, draw 7 cards. If tails, draw 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Repeat Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with the same name as 1 of your Pokémon in play, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rough Seas
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may heal 30 damage from each of his or her Water Pokémon and Lightning Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Scorched Earth
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may discard a Fire or Fighting Energy card from his or her hand. If that player does so, he or she draws 2 cards.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Shrine of Memories
rules: Each player's evolved Pokémon can use any attack from its previous Evolutions. (That player still needs the necessary Energy to use each attack.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Silent Lab
rules: Each Basic Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Teammates
rules: You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Weakness Policy
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to has no Weakness.
